mapper.select: SELECT id as id, objectType as objectType, department as department, groups as groups, partyId as partyId, title as title, titleImage as titleImage, digest as digest, type as type, isAtlas as isAtlas, isShare as isShare, isComment as isComment, layout as layout, pviews as pviews, commentCount as commentCount, participant as participant, endTime as endTime, address as address, isLive as isLive, orgId as orgId, orgType as orgType, show_index as show_index, createDate as createDate, updateDate as updateDate FROM ( SELECT n.id, 1 AS objectType, n.department, n.groups, n.partyid, n.title, n.titleImage, n.digest, n.type, n.isAtlas, n.isShare, n.isComment, n.layout, n.pviews, n.commentCount, NULL AS participant, NULL AS endTime, NULL AS address, n.isLive, n.orgId, n.BELONG_ORG_TYPE AS orgType, th.show_index, n.createDate, n.updataDate AS updateDate FROM news n, ty_homepage_content th, news_category_relevance ncr WHERE n.ID = th.id AND n.id = ncr.newsid AND th.object_type = 1 AND n.isPulish = 1 AND n.online_state = 1 AND n.TENANT_ID = '02000000' AND ncr.categoryId = 1 UNION SELECT a.id, 2, a.depView, a.groupView, a.partyView, a.`name`, a.titleImage, a.digest, a.typeId, NULL, a.isShare, a.isComment, NULL, a.reviewCount, a.commentCount, a.participant, a.endTime, a.address, NULL, a.organizationId, '1', th.show_index, a.create_date, a.last_update_date FROM activity a, ty_homepage_content th WHERE a.id = th.id AND th.object_type = 2 AND a.`status` = 1 AND a.tenant_id = '02000000' AND INSTR( CONCAT(',', a.categoryId, ','), CONCAT(',', 1, ',') ) ) t WHERE 1 = 1
